GapFillDragDrop.Title: Future phrases
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct answers to the spaces.

Content.Question:
1. ‘Sorry Paul, but can I call you back? I’m about to board a plane.’
2. Carla’s bound to have a spare jacket in her car. She’s always so well prepared for everything.
3. The Department of Health is set to introduce the new patient care initiatives some time next year.
4. The Men’s Singles Wimbledon final is due to start at 2 p.m. on Sunday.
5. We are unlikely to have our house renovated before the end of this year as we don’t have enough money.
6. Manchester United are to travel to Japan for a pre-season friendly tournament in August.
7. I’m so excited. We’re on the point of exchanging contracts for this wonderful remote cottage in the Cotswolds near Oxford.
8. Hans is on the verge of finalising a contract that would make his company £100,000 profit in the first year.
9. The President is to travel to Rome for a world summit on the subject of the environment.
10. Mum’s sure to have packed our swimsuits for the holidays. She never forgets things like that.
